```
en = snlp.Pipeline(lang='en')
def word_counts(x, pipeline=en):
  doc = pipeline(x)
  count = sum([len(sentence.tokens) for sentence in doc.sentences])
  return count 
```

```
en = snlp.Pipeline(lang='en')
def word_counts(x, pipeline=en):
  **doc = pipeline(x)**
  count = sum([len(sentence.tokens) for sentence in doc.sentences])
  return count 
```
